channel.title: OpenShift Overview :: Redhat Openshift (A Container Platform)
channel.description: OpenShift Licensing Models: Plus, Essentials, and Core Offerings Red Hat offers multiple versions of OpenShift that come with varying levels of functionality and features. These are primarily OpenShift Container Platform and OpenShift Plus, which are bundled with additional features. Below is a breakdown of these offerings. 1. OpenShift Container Platform (OCP) This is the core product and includes the essential components required to deploy and manage OpenShift clusters on-premises or in the cloud. It includes:
